website_summaries.verdict: Affordable option for someone who doesn't need all the bells and whistles
pros: Offers heating options between 240 and 450 degrees
Comes with a carrying case that is perfect for travel
No tangle formula keeps hair free from knots and snags
cons: Due to the lower price, this product won't last as long as some others on our list

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 10 stars I would. I am natural. 3c/4a. These flat irons are better than CHI and FHI. Straightened my hair to perfection. I LOVE them. AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: April Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Flatiron excellent value and it gets hot enough to straighten my hair without a problem some of them don't get hot enough to swim gets more than hot enough to do my thick hair
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Stone

customer_reviews.title: It heats up super fast
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this because my other one was not working. I love how this one heats up so fast and you can control temperature settings. It works on my way hair much faster than my previous iron. I like the finished results and it keeps my hair straight for a good portion of a humid day outside.😄
customer_reviews.author: Shirah

customer_reviews.title: and she uses the best brand equipment for her clients
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a hair dresser.. and she uses the best brand equipment for her clients... she could not believe the results of this iron on my hair.. I have thick curly hair!! This iron has had the best results on my hair!! Hands down the best flat iron!!
customer_reviews.author: kathy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Bought for the low price and high temp. My only cons are it’s heavy. Heaviest straightener I’ve had. And the heating part only goes maybe halfway down. All my other straighteners went down 3/4s of the way. But other than that it’s a great straightener.
customer_reviews.author: Kyliegh K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for silky looking hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I have always had trouble keeping my thin hair in a curling iron. This product securely holds my hair allowing me to get the straight silky looking hair I have always wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: design defects
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, looks good and works well. However, it won't stay sitting on the top or bottom, keeps falling over on its side, which means the hot areas are way too close to my table top for my comfort. Also the on/off switch and the temp control is on the INSIDE of the handle. I can see some burnt fingers in my future.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Chappel

customer_reviews.title: Impressed, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap straightener to get me by and this one is a delightful surprise! Granted, I mainly use straighteners just to tame frizz and add a little body opposed to every day full head straightening, but I am still impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flat iron....moves smoothly through your hair!
customer_reviews.text: Could not wait to get this item, especially after reading the reviews! I love it......its very smooth and easy to use in your hair, with no tangling. It is nice size an weight; it comes wrapped in bubble wrap and with a travel bag. I do agree with other reviews about the location of the settings button; its in a inconvient area. However the location comes in handy to prevent you from changing the settings in error.
customer_reviews.author: SwissMiss

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron is absolutely wonderful my my daughters and I have Thick hair and this flat iron is amazing. It straighten all of our hair to a beautiful silky texture don't let the price fool you... this flat iron is what you have been looking for and will not find it in stores. Especially for this price and the quality of its performance!!! Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Raija

customer_reviews.title: This is the best flat iron I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best flat iron I've ever bought! I've spent hundreds, YES hundreds over the years on tourmaline flat irons and this one is the best! You can't beat the price! It's so nice and works great! Its has a dial for temp and on/off switch. But you cannot tell what temp it is. This doesn't matter to me. And it doesn't have a test/reset button. With all that said, it's still the best I've bought and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F

customer_reviews.title: love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new flatiron since mine broke and I am so happy with my new purchase. I was not familiar with the brand but after reading some of the reviews I decided to give it a try since it was also pretty inexpensive (another plus). The Gurin ceramic Tourmaline flat iron delivers: it makes my hair shinny and it is very easy to use. I've got several compliments from "do you have a new haircut, to did you change your hair color?" . I absolutely love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: goldfish7

customer_reviews.title: works great ,not heavy ,nice grip. Ceramic plates
customer_reviews.text: It has temperature control came in a nice red silk bag along in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product..its a bit on the heavy side but I like that may not be the think for you. It heat quickly and the pouch is a nice touch. My only discomfort which I read about in the previous reviews is the placement of the control button. I really dont like it and its not easily accessible. Other than that its a beautiful well built tool built to last.
customer_reviews.author: LNathan

customer_reviews.title: I am a guy with short hair, and I use it for something else.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to iron my shirts. Best for collars. No need to get iron board and iron, only to realize your collars are awkward.
customer_reviews.author: aaaa

customer_reviews.title: Multiple styles accomplished with one tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Gurin Flat Iron. Works great with multiple styling options, using the same tool. The plates are designed to allow you to curl the ends or leave straight. My only suggestion would be to add an ON light to the iron. It would help prevent people from leaving it on. Overall a Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Pulls hair
customer_reviews.text: Product itself was okay. However when I started straightening my hair the ceramic pieces would get caught near the ends and start to pull my hair out.
customer_reviews.author: jessica demarce

customer_reviews.title: Silky Smooth Hair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the new Gurin hair iron! It came in a beautiful red bag so the presentation was great. As soon as I plugged it in the iron was hot and ready to go. My hair is silk smooth with no damage! 4 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: KT Hepburn

customer_reviews.title: My daughter has naturally curly hair so it is tough to find a good inexpensive straightener that will work
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional cosmetologist and I was looking for something quick and inexpensive for my daughter who needed something she could take with her to dance competitions and would not have to worry about it getting misplaced. My daughter has naturally curly hair so it is tough to find a good inexpensive straightener that will work. This product works great and does the job, making her hair straight, she is also able to get beautiful barrel curls using this straightener that last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This flatiron snags your hair already experiencing breakage to my hair very cheaply made product will be returning ASAP!!!! Returned and got the HSI Professional Ceramic flatirons alittle more expensive but they are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for two years. I have a really small bathroom and have dropped it dozens of times. It finally broke today. I definitely got my money's worth out of it. It was easy to use, even for someone who's not good at doing hair.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this straightener! It makes my hair look and feel great and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered a lot of items from Amazon and never disappoint until now. I read the reviews like I always do for this item and most of them were very good. The problem with this flatiron was it could not traighten my hair. It did not close completely except at the end. I don't like to leave a bad review but I felt like it is justified
customer_reviews.author: Gail Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great straightening.
customer_reviews.text: Really a good deal for the price! Comes with a cute little bag to carry it in too. Gets hot and straightens my hair so good. I definitely recommend it! 😍 love it.
customer_reviews.author: cheree

customer_reviews.title: Overall OK but pulls fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it works ok. I have fine hair and it pulls it some. I use it as a backup and travel straightener since it is smaller than my regular one, so it serves the purpose. Will keep my Remington as my main straightener though.
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this because one of my best friends let me borrow hers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because one of my best friends let me borrow hers. I have a lion's mane of curly hair and this flat iron out performs any other flat iron that I have owned, including my Chi. Also came with a cool red travel bag. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it, I have thick wavy hair that's medium ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I have thick wavy hair that's medium length and very hard to straighten. Used a little product, blow dried straight and then straightened and it worked wonderful all the way to the root which is where my problem usually is. Can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Danyele Middlestetter

customer_reviews.title: This is the best flat iron with a great price point
customer_reviews.text: This is the best flat iron with a great price point. I own a Paul Mitchell one I paid $150 for and now that sits unused as this one is far better.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I have 4c natural hair and, using the chase method, got an extremely smooth flat iron that lasted for nearly two weeks
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: ... the chi and said this one is just as good as the chi and I (the mother) paid $120
customer_reviews.text: My daughter compared it to the chi and said this one is just as good as the chi and I (the mother) paid $120.00 for the chi. For this straightener, I only paid like $22.00. I am so very happy she is happy with this product and that I saved $100.00. Now I know when my other daughter is ready for a new straightener (she also has a CHI), I know where I'm going to purchase her next one. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Works for my fine hair
customer_reviews.text: This gets hot and ready fast. Curls my hair when I want curls and they stay all day without product. I have had this since last year and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: aWitchyWolfe

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with the item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this straightener for my daughter. She is very happy with the item. All her friends want one!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Mobley

customer_reviews.title: May work for you.
customer_reviews.text: Returned item received refund, and flat iron replacement free of charge. The gesture from seller was acknowledged. However it doesn't change the fact that i feel it doesn't work well with certain hair types.
customer_reviews.author: Elee

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: the actual heating part is kind of small so i found that it takes a bit longer than normal, but otherwise great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gurin Ceramic Tourmaline Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: didn't even try it because I could tell it is a unit that had been sold and returned. the electric cord was not wrapped correctly.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fro my daughter. She is very pleased. No snagging, quick heat-up time. Only negative is wish it came in a wider size.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Partin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once but it does the job. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: SassyLou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hair straightener. I would recommend this one over the Chi!
customer_reviews.author: Busy_Dance_Mom

customer_reviews.title: One swoop and my hair is straight
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one after many years of service from the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Claudie

customer_reviews.title: not as nice as my solia but it will work for now
customer_reviews.text: broke my solia and got this to replace it after reading the reviews. not as nice as my solia but it will work for now.
customer_reviews.author: shabyg

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't glide smoothly thru hair at all! You get what you pay for....cheaply made item!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Larsen

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give this zero stars. You ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this zero stars. You get what you pay for. It doesn't smooth the hair and barely straightens.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB Product!
customer_reviews.text: The product is durable and is easy to use. It heats fast too!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Reqz

customer_reviews.title: You no need expend a lot of money,
customer_reviews.text: You no need expend a lot of money , with this flat iron you can have in home the same that you expend in the salon
customer_reviews.author: Bertilde

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Love this iron! Really straightens and leaves my hair shiny. Better than my rip off $200.00 mall iron.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent....get your hair really straight....fast 2 day shipping...and great bargain!!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl walters

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this flat iron for about 5 months. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: yn79382

customer_reviews.title: Work much better than CHI
customer_reviews.text: Incredible flat iron for the price. Work much better than CHI!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gread gift for my granddaughters, no more fighting for the hot iron.
customer_reviews.author: Rick13

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! I got a product that works just like it was advertised. I use it every day and I have had not problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ferne Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best flat iron I've ever owned had it for years ...
customer_reviews.text: Best flat iron I've ever owned had it for years (use it daily) no issues. I have very thick, long and curly hair. This flat iron truly is the best!
customer_reviews.author: LINDSAY CORRELL

customer_reviews.title: She is in the cosmetology program at school and it's perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this flat iron. She is in the cosmetology program at school and it's perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best flat iron thus far and Ive spent alot on expensive ones
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Not professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not professional quality. Didn't get hot enough. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: carol d johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy wit this product, great find for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hair is very straight leaves a very good shine to the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Did a great Job
customer_reviews.text: This flatiron did great job on my daughters frizzy hair and I was able to put a flip in the ends for her. Worked great with no snagging and she has THICK hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dana C. Mason

customer_reviews.title: ... bought one of this to my wife and she love it. It is a very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of this to my wife and she love it. It is a very good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for 3 years now and it has been the best one I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've had this straightener for 3 years now and it has been the best one I have purchased. Does not snag your hair and takes less than 30 seconds to heat up, gives your hair a great shine.
customer_reviews.author: Aiyna Dhillon

customer_reviews.title: Straightener works great!: -) I was looking for a new ...
customer_reviews.text: Straightener works great! :-) I was looking for a new one so when I saw it on amazon I bought it because it was a fantastic deal. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: laddy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it.. works great. Doesnt damage my hair as much as my old one
customer_reviews.author: joseline

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be the product that was advertised. It gets hot and it really straightens my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Straightnochaserlaca

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: use it every week leave my hair nice and shining without burning it!!
customer_reviews.author: socorro hornberger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The flat iron is perfect for my daughter's hair. It comes with a nice travel/storage bag. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bell-International LLC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wish it was digital insted of the dial but it still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon flat iron. This is the first flat iron to get my kinky 4c hair straight. The only reason I took off a star was because you can't tell what temp you are using it has a dial 140-450 degrees no numbers in between so you twist it and kind of eyeball where your desired temp would probably be. It's well made and feels comparable to a high end unit. I really love it!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: This iron is what I was looking for and the price was awesome, thank you for always having the finest products.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: It does not get hot enough and the light keep ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not get hot enough and the light keep switching between red and green the whole time. I believe I got a defective product
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gibin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great straightener and great price. Very smooth and makes my hair shine.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hair came out straight and smooth.... had body and shine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works as well as more expensive models. Heats quickly.
customer_reviews.author: EL007

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed with this product! The reviews I read were completely wrong. This product did not straighten my hair at all.
customer_reviews.author: sonydelia

customer_reviews.title: Great for sealing mylar bags
customer_reviews.text: Great product - I was looking for one of these to seal mylar bags, so I only wanted to spend about $20. I found this one steeply discounted from about $200, not sure why. But it works like a charm, hits 450 degrees - more than enough to seal mylar. So I'm not complaining!
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my type of curly hair. It works awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Gabb

customer_reviews.title: I really do like this flat iron - the only regret I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this flat iron - the only regret I have is that I didn't a larger size, because I do have long hair. But I might just get the larger size and keep this one. Excellent and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: pidkuy

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Quality sucks! Very disappointed with product because it does not straighten my hair and this hair straightener feels and looks cheap
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: not good for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had listened other reviews. It's not good for thin hair, pulling on it somewhat, while also having a hard time holding hair between the plates. Can't make ribbon curls with thin hair
customer_reviews.author: iamnotunique

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a back up to my Remington but it has quickly moved up to the one I reach for first. Does the job, and does it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Bacon

customer_reviews.title: I am actually sending this product back. The plates ...
customer_reviews.text: I am actually sending this product back. The plates were chipped and it snagged my hair on the very first try.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Same as those ones they try to sell you at the mall!
customer_reviews.text: Some guy tricked me into sitting at his little kiosk in the mall while he straightened my hair. I'd never straightened my hair before; I thought my hair WAS straight. Boy was I wrong! My hair looked so amazing I almost bought his stupid, expensive hair straightener on the spot. I'm glad I didn't; this is essentially the same thing but 1/10 the price. Sorry, mall kiosky guy, but thanks for doing my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Egirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I am a natural with 4a-4b hair. This flat iron work pretty good on my hair and the cost was very reasonable. I would recommend this product to other naturals with 4 hair.
customer_reviews.author: ERICA S GREEN

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does not heat up to the temperature it says, it does not help my thick coarse hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product sucked!
customer_reviews.text: Was not worth the wait. Horrible product! With all the hassle I had to go through to get this product. I was expecting something way better!!
customer_reviews.author: brittainy

customer_reviews.title: Ouch....no cool surfaces!
customer_reviews.text: Hot....hot....HOT. There is no way not to get burned using this....I do, however like the rounded frame, makes it easy to curl as well as straighten.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer-Beware

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome overall, but for me the temp
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome overall, but for me the temp. Knob is really loose and gets off the setting I want it at , but other than that it's good. Straightened my hair in half the time
customer_reviews.author: Sara yardley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality,Good Results,& Very Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this straightener it work so well on my hair. If you have thick,course,super curly hair it works great. I used this on the highest temperature and it made my hair so straight,I love it. The carrying case broke when I first used it,but I didn't really need it so I doesn't really matter. Overall it is a nice straightener and I would defenitly purchase another and reccomend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rozlyn

customer_reviews.title: Best Flat Iron I Ever Own
customer_reviews.text: Love the flat iron, it heats up quick, high heat settings good for my thick hair, leaves hair shiny and I love the Gurin Ceramic Plates hair just slides through!!!In addition the flat iron bag that comes with it, is cute and useable ! I would recommend this to others !
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money and it only tskes one time to straighten my hair. takes me 15 Minutes tops! would buy again! shipping on the other hand took a few extra days to deliver but I still appreciate it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have thick hair and it doesn't get hot enough. Also, unlike other ceramic flat irons I have, it doesn't leave it sleek. Used it twice and never again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man and sometimes a have a long hair, but most of the time, short hair. It straightens my hair easily. It is sometimes used by my female cousin and use it for curling.
customer_reviews.author: Pen name

customer_reviews.title: We Like It
customer_reviews.text: Certainly, a great product. It gets the job done. I bought it for my college daughter to flat iron her African American natural hair occasionally. She doesn't intentionally aim for really really straight hair, but I believe it can get your hair extremely straight using some of that hair straightener product. Sorry, I cannot think of its name at the moment. However, I highly recommend this product to you. It's a winner for this family ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Alice Grant

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flat iron ever
customer_reviews.text: I had one just like this & my son dropped and the ceramic cracked. I was sad because it was my favorite one & it worked the best. Looked online & found the exact same one. I am so happy to have it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I liked the fact it had ceramic/tourmaline plates
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact it had ceramic/tourmaline plates. This combination is best for my hair. However, the one I received had very rough looking edges along-side the plate and when I tried curling my hair with the iron it would snag and pull the hair. The plates also didn't close completely and I could see a space between the closed plates on one end. As I ran the iron straight down my hair, it would snag. The iron also didn't get hot enough to straighten my hair completely. Over all, the thought of spending $24.95 on a ceramic/tourmaline flatiron that actually works for my hair was good. Using the flatiron wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: kayj1999

customer_reviews.title: Good for straightening women of color nonchemically treated hair
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a flat iron that straightens black nonchemical treated hair. I was told that the temperature had to be between 400 & 450 to accomplish straight hair for women of color that DO NOT use chemicals to straighten their hair. This does the job and comes with a carrying case. Priced others with this temperature and most of them were twice the price. Once you get use to the barrel of this flat iron it's easy to use. Try it, you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: PA Info Queen’s husband

customer_reviews.title: This is a great company that cares about what they do
customer_reviews.text: This is a great company that cares about what they do. My straightener arrived quickly and is very sturdy. I had a very expensive straightener given to me as a gift that cracked snd broke extremely easy. This straightener gets very hot and has plates that smooth hair nicely. My only complaint is that it does get pretty hot on the outside, so you have to be mindful!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter since she has very kinky curly hair. Her hair is coarse and thick. It worked well for her hair but not as good as a Chi but for the price it worked great. She has hair to the middle of her back and we had to take small sections and go over a couple of times to get it straight. If you are looking for a Chi quality straighter for a cheap price then this is not for you. It will work but not as quickly as a high end straightener. For the price we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly1215

customer_reviews.title: Straight in the Blink of an Eye!
customer_reviews.text: The Gurin Tourmaline Flatiron I ordered is wonderful. It's quick heating and straightens my hair in half the time that it took me before. My hair was perfectly straight and it even had a shine to it. I've used straighteners that costed $100's of dollars and this one is every bit as good if not better. I highly recommend that if you're looking to buy a new straightener, check out #Amazon for the Gurin Ceramic Tourmaline straightner. You won't regret the few dollars you spend.
customer_reviews.author: Dana brouillette

customer_reviews.title: Solid, effective and leaves hair silky
customer_reviews.text: This was fantastic for the price! It is pretty simple, but you can feel the quality. I would rather have longevity than a million fancy buttons. It was good to my hair, the temp dial worked well and was accurate and the tourmaline in the ceramic absolutely left my hair shiny. I'm a happy girl. I haven't had it long, but I feel like I definitely will. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Duby

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to replace my old hair straightener while I am at college. I really like it! It doesn't pull your hair, it heats up fairly quick and has a plenty long cord. I gave it 4 stars because I don't like where the heat dial and on/off switch are located (on the inside). I haven't burnt myself but it is just a matter of time, I wouldn't ever pay 200 dollars for this product; however, for 25 it is a really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: Great Straightner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It heats up quickly and nicely straightens my unruly curls. I was concerned about the placement of the on/off switch when I first saw it but it hasn’t been an issue at all
customer_reviews.author: kallico1231

product_meta.title: Gurin Ceramic Tourmaline Flat Iron Hair Straightener, 1.25 inch with Carrying Case
feature_bullets: Straighten, flip and curl your hair
Adjustable temperature from 240F to 450F (120C - 220C) to suit all hair types
Ceramic/tourmaline plates create a shinier, silkier finish in lesser time
1 inch plate width, wide enough for any hair length and hair types, yet narrow enough for bangs
Transform frizzy, dull hair into gorgeous straight, sleek locks
